content.query:
CREATE PROC [dbo].[Proceduresp]

AS
BEGIN 

MERGE into Employee as TGT
USING EmployeeStage SRC
ON TGT.ID = SRC.ID
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET
        TGT.Name = SRC.Name,
        TGT.Jobtitle = SRC.Jobitle,
        TGT.lastmodified = SRC.lastmodified

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN      
INSERT (
        ID,
        Name,
        Jobtitle,
        lastmodified
)

values(
        SRC.ID,
        SRC.Name,
        SRC.Jobtitle,
        SRC.lastmodified
)

END
